<h3 id="X22765">X(22765) = HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 2nd CIRCUMPERP TANGENTIAL AND X3-ABC REFLECTIONS</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2*(a^5-(b+c)*a^4-(2*b^2-3*b*c+2*c^2)*a^3+2*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a^2+(b^4+c^4-3*(b-c)^2*b*c)*a-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)^3)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(22765) = 3*X(3)-2*X(2077) = 5*X(3)-2*X(5537) = 3*X(36)-X(2077) = 5*X(36)-X(5537) = X(40)-3*X(5131) = 5*X(1656)-4*X(3814) = 7*X(3526)-8*X(6681) = 2*X(5057)-5*X(18493) = 2*X(5176)-3*X(5790) = X(5180)-3*X(5603) = 3*X(5298)-2*X(6713) = 3*X(5886)-2*X(11813)</b>
<p>X(22765) lies on the cubic K725 and these lines:
{1,3}, {4,20067}, {5,2975}, {8,6924}, {21,5901}, {30,104}, {74,6584}, {100,5844}, {110,859}, {119,529}, {140,5253}, {145,6942}, {195,22781}, {355,8666}, {381,535}, {382,11928}, {388,6863}, {399,22586}, {404,5690}, {496,7491}, {499,6971}, {515,12747}, {519,12331}, {573,21773}, {758,6265}, {946,12600}, {952,6905}, {956,5176}, {958,1656}, {993,5886}, {995,5398}, {1012,18515}, {1056,6954}, {1351,9037}, {1478,6980}, {1483,11491}, {1532,10742}, {1598,1878}, {1621,7508}, {1727,17638}, {1951,22144}, {2687,5606}, {2718,6011}, {2800,4973}, {3086,6928}, {3149,18525}, {3218,14988}, {3421,6970}, {3436,6959}, {3526,6681}, {3556,14530}, {3560,5057}, {3600,6825}, {3622,6875}, {3628,5260}, {3843,18761}, {3877,19525}, {4188,12245}, {4189,10595}, {4293,6923}, {4297,16117}, {4299,10525}, {4996,19907}, {5054,10197}, {5123,9708}, {5146,7497}, {5180,5603}, {5251,11230}, {5258,9956}, {5265,6891}, {5267,13464}, {5298,6713}, {5450,12699}, {5694,6763}, {5762,7677}, {5780,17615}, {5840,15326}, {5887,13465}, {6417,19014}, {6418,19013}, {6597,12919}, {6834,20076}, {6842,18990}, {6862,10532}, {6868,14986}, {6882,15325}, {6906,22791}, {6910,10597}, {6915,18357}, {6917,10527}, {6934,10529}, {6936,10586}, {6949,20060}, {6958,7288}, {6962,10805}, {7517,22654}, {9301,22744}, {9654,22759}, {9669,22760}, {10090,19914}, {10620,22583}, {11495,15688}, {11499,12513}, {11500,18526}, {11842,22520}, {11911,22755}, {11916,22756}, {11917,22757}, {11949,22761}, {11950,22762}, {12188,22504}, {12355,22565}, {12429,22659}, {12601,22595}, {12602,22624}, {12684,18237}, {12872,22777}, {12902,19478}, {13093,22778}, {13102,22774}, {13103,22773}, {13108,22779}, {13111,22780}, {13115,19159}, {13126,22782}, {13188,22514}, {13310,19162}, {13713,22783}, {13836,22784}, {13903,22763}, {13961,22764}, {14217,15228}, {15611,17734}, {16628,22771}, {16629,22772}, {17455,19297}, {18519,19541}, {22680,22728}, {22776,22979}</p>
<p>
X(22765) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1, 5535}, {4, 20067}, {14217, 15228}<br>
X(22765) = reflection of X(6882) in X(15325)<br>
X(22765) = circumperp conjugate of X(3579)<br>
X(22765) = inverse of X(1385) in the circumcircle<br>
X(22765) = inverse of X(13750) in the incircle<br>
X(22765) = inverse of X(1482) in the Stammler circle<br>
X(22765) = isogonal conjugate of antigonal conjugate of X(1389)<br>
X(22765) = X(2070)-of-2nd-circumperp-triangle<br>
X(22765) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,3,37621), (1, 36, 5172), (1, 7280, 14795), (3, 1482, 11849), (3, 8148, 11248), (3, 10247, 55), (3, 10680, 1482), (3, 12001, 3295), (36, 5193, 5126), (40, 5131, 10225), (56, 22767, 999), (1381, 1382, 1385), (1385, 6583, 1), (2095, 10246, 1482), (2446, 2447, 13750), (5204, 11248, 3), (11009, 14792, 14882)<br>
</p>
